ModMetaData.name: Colonists' Deco
ModMetaData.author: Abe Vriens
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds the ability for colonists to decorate their own rooms.
Features: - Colonists will decorate their bedroom with all kinds of decorations. Doing this levels up their construction skill. - The decorations that are hung up by your colonists reflect the tech level of your colony.
Planned: - Add room specific decorations - Add customisable decorations
Camera+ is recommended if you want to see the decorations in detail.
Feel free to contact me if you have any problems with the mod.
Current version - [V2.2.0]
